summary.Title: Warehouse workers for day, evening and nightshift
summary.JobHeadline: Warehouse workers for day, evening and nightshift
summary.Presentation: You have experience with picking and packing, using a runner and you can start working as soon as possible.    We are constantly looking for new warehouse workes in Horsens and the area nearby

WorkPlace.Name: JKS a/s, Horsens
WorkPlace.Description: JKS er Danmarks største vikar- og rekrutteringsbureau med filialer over hele landet og 20 års erfaring. Vi har et indgående kendskab til lokalområdet, hvilket er en forudsætning for at finde spændende opgaver til vores medarbejdere. Desuden lægger vi vægt på, at der er styr på instruktion, udstyr m.v. - og at lønnen udbetales korrekt og til tiden. Hos JKS tilbyder vi vikariater af kortere og længere varighed, Try & Hire-forløb, projektansættelser samt rekruttering til fastansættelse.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse workers for day, evening and nightshift
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
You have experience with picking and packing, using a runner and you can start working as soon as possible.

We are constantly looking for new warehouse workes in Horsens and the area nearby for day, evening and nightshift.



Tasks/responsibilities:

  • Packing
  • Picking
  • Using a runner
  • Other varying tasks


Professional qualifications:

  • It is a great advantage if you have some practical warehouse experience
  • Forklift certificate is a plus
  • You can work independently, structured and efficient
  • You are capable and confident and take an active part in the work
  • You are methodical and quality-conscious

Personal qualities:

  • You are punctual and reliable
  • You are committed and flexible
  • You can provide a criminal record


As a JKS employee you work in accordance with collective agreement terms including applicable allowances, pension payment etc.



Interested?
If you are interested, please forward your application and CV via Søg stillingen.

Applications will be processed on an ongoing basis.
